mapper.select: SELECT ph.purchase_history_id, p.pd_title, p.pd_contents, p.price FROM purchase_history ph INNER JOIN product p ON ph.product_id = p.product_id ORDER BY ph.purchase_history_id;

SELECT ph.purchase_history_id, p.pd_category, p.pd_title, p.pd_contents, p.price, u.nickname FROM purchase_history ph INNER JOIN product p ON ph.product_id = p.product_id INNER JOIN user u ON ph.user_id = u.user_id WHERE ph.purchase_history_id = #{purchaseId};
